<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tiger Slash](/Feats.aspx?ID=6006) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=67) (Level 8), [Wild Mimic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=226) (Level 8), [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=255) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
[Tiger Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5983)

**Requirements**
You are in Tiger Stance.

</column>

---

You make a fierce swipe with both hands. Make a tiger claw Strike. It deals two extra weapon damage dice (three extra dice if you're 14th level or higher), and you can [push](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the target 5 feet away as if you had successfully [Shoved](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380) them. If the attack is a critical success and deals damage, add your Strength modifier to the [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) from your tiger claw.
name: Tiger Slash
